alert.note: Alert for West Jackson and West Grand Counties Above 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 10 at 2:49AM MST until January 10 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow ongoing. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Rabbit Ears Pass. * WHEN...Until Noon MST today. * IMPACTS...Roads will likely be slick and hazardous. Snow covered roads will make travel hazardous.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org. Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving.

area.areaDesc: West Jackson and West Grand Counties Above 9000 Feet
